long_description: These women's Salomon SNS(R) Pilot(R) classic bindings offer premier control and energy transmission, pushing you farther on every kick. 2 axis points with steel links add torsional rigidity for better energy transmission on the edges. Full-length ridge plates enhance contact with skis for better control. Automatic step-in system; pole or manual step-out. Flex: 100.
short_description: These women's Salomon SNS(R) Pilot(R) classic bindings offer premier control and energy transmission, pushing you farther on every kick.
